page.title: 03CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: In Bewdley we have the usual clubs like football and tennis and we can do others like fishing because we have the river and forest.Here we have some lists of our clubs. { RIVER FOREST SPORTS HOLIDAY fishing Y.O.C judo bowling rowing rambling cricket sailing Young tennis Foresters shooting {LOCAL CLUBS} football cricket badminton football(Wasps) bowling tennis rugby Round Table(put up Christmas lights) Cubs,Scouts Brownies,Guides Although Bewdley has a river there is no swimming pool/sports centre.So the young people have to travel to neighbouring towns.
